name: Ethereal: Stra is life
description:
You wanted to waste your time? Then this is the best way to waste your time!

A simple and small game to waste your time, where you jump and shoot enemies. Defeat enemies, bosses, dodge projectiles and upgrade some skills for longer duration with slightly increased spawn rate.

It is my first project and I built it using a pygame library for windows OS only

Built it with a windows 10 64bit architecture, so other windows version might have issue launching this game. But I'll add another file where it can run windows 7 32 bit version.

It has a fixed screen size with 900 x 521 pixels

Some controls:

O - to shoot

Space - to jump

A and D - to move (only for boss fight)

Its possible to change difficulty levels depending to your preferences

Thank you for the blessings:  Backgrounds:

     Eder Muniz

     Olga's Lab

     saukgp

     ansimuz

     Free and Premium Game Assets (GUI, Sprite, Tilesets) - Craftpix.net 

Sprites animation:

     aamatniekss

     ansimuz

     LuizMelo

     Rentro_Ghost

   

I started this as my first simple game project for my resume and had no idea of programming at that time. I was planning to release this for free but I kinda wanted money for my rent, tuition or medical bills so I’m selling it for $1. Still a beginner in programming and game development stuff.

Special thanks to mr epee for the great insights

Lastly, If some content is controversial or disrespectful, I apologize.

Spoiler!

Has a total of 5 bosses, after that its an endless mode

Only for windows operating systems only!

If you have concerns, email me

janjan6star@gmail.com
